game.name: Tabletop Fantasy War
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Tabletop Fantasy War is a turn-based strategy game where you create your unit groups, deploy them on the game board, and command them through strategic actions. Your units are all you have. Every action is decisive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tabletop Fantasy War is a turn-based strategy game where you create your unit groups, deploy them on the game board, and command them through strategic actions. Your units are all you have. Every action is decisive.
